document.masterDocTitle: The type material of spider wasps (Hymenoptera, Pompilidae) deposited in the Federal Scientific Center of the East Asia Terrestrial Biodiversity, Russian Academy of Sciences, Vladivostok, Russia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The type material of spider wasps (Hymenoptera, Pompilidae) deposited in the Federal Scientific Center of the East Asia Terrestrial Biodiversity, Russian Academy of Sciences, Vladivostok, Russia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality .
Russia : Eastern Siberia (Buryat Rep.), Far East ( Amur Prov. , Khabarovsk Terr., Primorskii Terr., Magadan Prov. , Chukot Autonomous Area )
.

Holotype
( ♂ ). Приморский край / Занадворовка / Лелей 23 VI 1987 [ Russia , Primorskii Terr., Zanadvorovka, 23.VI.1987 (A. Lelej)] // Holotypus ♂ /
Arachnospila
/ (
Ammosphex
) /
kurentzovi Lelej.

Current status .
Arachnospila ( Ammosphex ) kurentzovi Lelej, 1995
.
Distribution . Russia : Eastern Siberia (Buryat Rep.), Far East ( Amur Prov. , Khabarovsk Terr., Primorskii Terr., Magadan Prov. , Chukot Autonomous Area) (Loktionov & Lelej 2017).
Remarks . Chukot Autonomous Area was not mentioned as type locality due to misinterpretation of a label in the original description.
